messages.TRMSG_PRE_DOUBLE_BATTLE_1:
It makes no difference where we are.If you have Pokémon with you,
I reckon you ought to battle.
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_DEFEAT_1:
You’ve got a lot of giddyap and go
in you!
messages.TRMSG_POST_DOUBLE_BATTLE_1:
Over a long life, you’ll be certain
to have some sad farewells.But I reckon there are also some
new beginnings.
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_NOT_ENOUGH_POKEMON_1:
Hahaha! I’m afraid y’all are no match
for us with jus’ one of them Pokémon!
messages.TRMSG_PRE_DOUBLE_BATTLE_2:
My Pokémon is a lively one.
Lemme show you how much!
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_DEFEAT_2: Well! Aren’t you the lively one!
messages.TRMSG_POST_DOUBLE_BATTLE_2:
Them graves here in Lost Tower...
Right’n here, inside my heart...Those are the places where my
Pokémon remain...
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_NOT_ENOUGH_POKEMON_2:
You haven’t got yerself two
Pokémon?
